alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hand; Hughes; Hyde; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:14PM MDT until June 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hand County in central South Dakota... Southern Hyde County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Hughes County in central South Dakota... North central Lyman County in central South Dakota... Northern Buffalo County in central South Dakota... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 613 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Bend Rec Area, or 10 miles north of Lower Brule, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Stephan around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Miller Dale Colony, Sunshine Bible Academy and Pleasant Valley Country Church. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
